title: Riemannian starshape and capacitary problems
authors: Kazuhiro Ishige, Paolo Salani, Asuka Takatsu
abstract:
We prove the Riemannian version of a classical Euclidean result: every level
set of the capacitary potential of a starshaped ring is starshaped. In the
Riemannian setting, we restrict ourselves to starshaped rings in a warped
product of an open interval and the unit sphere. We also extend the result by
replacing the Laplacian with the $q$-Laplacian.
